data.actual_result: The "Camera Roll" screen locks itself in portrait mode even if you don't have portrait lock on
data.expected_result: The "Camera Roll" screen would show in the corresponding mode (either in portrait or in landscape mode)
data.short_description: (iPad running iOS 10.3.3 or lower) When choosing a picture to upload in the "Camera Roll" screen, the screen will lock itself in portrait mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the app open either in portrait or landscape mode - Tap the paperclip and select "Camera Roll"
